item.title: About
item.description: About I have been using FreeBSD since the 2.x Release and OpenBSD since around the 3.5 Release. I do not have much use with NetBSD but since OpenBSD is a basic copy of it I can say I have. Reason as to why I use BSD will be posted at a leter date.

item.title: links
item.description: A few links to some informative sites about BSD BSD Hardware FreeBSD OpenBSD

item.title: New Post
item.description: The first post. First post for using, playing around and possibly replacing my site using a site generator. Why: less server services running especially sql and PHP is a happier server Less: load on the server currently the highest usage are from php, sql Able to install OpenBSD and use it’s internal basic httpd Static files load fast just like they did in the early 90’s
